name: shell-bell
effect: Held: Heals the holder by 1/8 of any damage it inflicts.
short_effect: Held: Holder receives 1/8 of the damage it deals when attacking.

flavor_text.sun_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder regains a little HP every time it inflicts damage on others.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: An item to be held by a Pokémon. The holder regains a little HP every time it inflicts damage on others.
